tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pesticide_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name TEXT,
    usage_date DATE,
    pesticide_name TEXT,
    quantity_used INT,
    impact_on_health TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE pesticides (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 type VARCHAR(50),
 toxicity_level VARCHAR(20));

CREATE TABLE crop_health (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 crop_id INT,
 date DATE,
 pesticide_id INT,
 application_amount DECIMAL,
 impact_on_health VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE PesticideUsage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pesticide_name VARCHAR(255),
  usage_date DATE,
  quantity_used INT,
  crop_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  monitoring_date DATE,
  pesticide_residuals FLOAT,
  health_status VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(id)
);

CREATE TABLE pesticide_usage (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  pesticide_name VARCHAR(50),
  application_date DATE,
  application_quantity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE pesticide_usage ( 
 id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 crop_id INT, 
 pesticide_name VARCHAR(255), 
 usage_date DATE, 
 quantity_used DECIMAL(10,2) 
 );

CREATE TABLE crop ( 
 id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 crop_name VARCHAR(100), 
 crop_type VARCHAR(50), 
 planting_date DATE, 
 harvest_date DATE 
 );
